name: Winter Drinks With Will: Hot Buttered Mai Tai
description: I believe very strongly in the restorative powers of warm whiskey and as such will not indulge in this cure for the common cold except when medically indicated. Which means I needed to come up with something else to drink when the air is cold but my body is well.
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons zest from 1 orange, plus 4 orange zest twists

recipeInstructions.text: Combine butter, zest, and almond extract in small bowl and mash with fork until well blended. Pour 2 ounces rum into four small coffee mugs. Add 1 tablespoon of the butter mixture to each. Top with just-boiled water and stir until butter is melted. Add honey to taste (about 2 teaspoons is normal). Garnish with orange twist and serve immediately.
